item.title: Apple Finally Destroyed Steve Jobs’ Vision of the iPad. Good
item.description: Cupertino has done the thing it swore it never would: turn its tablet into a full-blown window-wrangling, compromise-abandoning computer. Yes, it’s better, but lurking deep in the settings the ghost o
